section.title: PT Maju Jaya Utama Lestari
section.description: Your trusted partner for plastic packaging manufacturing and rotogravure printing at industrial scale.

profile.title: Company Profile
profile.description: Maju Jaya Utama Lestari, Pt is located in Tangerang, Indonesia and operates in plastic packaging manufacturing with rotogravure printing services. Maju Jaya Utama Lestari, Pt has 100 total employees across all locations and generates 2.58 million in sales (USD).

address.title: Head Office
address.value: 9 Jl. Manis II Manis Industrial Estate, Tangerang 15136, Indonesia

mainClients.title: Trusted by Key Business Partners
mainClients.subtitle: Long-term partnerships in logistics and distribution

description.main: PT Maju Jaya Utama Lestari supports business partners with dependable packaging quality and responsive operational coordination.
description.secondary: Our customer portfolio includes long-standing partnerships that prioritize reliability, precision, and scalable supply.

mainClients.cardCaption: Trusted partnership in logistics and transportation excellence
